title: [GAMEPLAY] Possible Snow Day Malzahar Recall Skin error
body:
So while playing Snow Day {{champion:90}} Malzahar today, I noticed a skin bug in the recall animation.  At first, the recalling was fine.  However, after a couple times recalling, I noticed that the Voidling Poro was not skinned, but had a solid blue color instead, which I can probably guess means that there is a skin error. I dont know if it is just my client personally or an actual issue, but I thought I might as well report it. Here is a screenshot.
http://imgur.com/z1vjBlY

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!

this has been around fro weeks now when will it get fixed?
